author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Abyssus, a fast-paced action online co-op roguelite developed by Double Moose Games. Players will explore the uncharted depths alone or with three other friends to investigate a powerful electromagnetic source that so happens to be an ancient sunken city. Take up arms against enemies wielding ancient yet powerful weaponry. Fight deeper and deeper into the city with new weaponry, upgrades, and mods to acquire. Abyssus is available now for PC (Steam).
title: Abyssus - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Star Trek’s most iconic villain Khan is back! The anxiously awaited scripted podcast series, Star Trek: Khan, is set to release its first episode on September 8, 2025, in celebration of Star Trek Day. 

Star Trek: Khan explores the untold events on Ceti Alpha V, chronicling Khan’s descent from a superhuman visionary into the vengeful villain seen in Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan. New episodes will be available weekly on Mondays through November 3, wherever you get your podcasts.

Naveen Andrews (Lost) voices the iconic role of Khan Noonien Singh, and is joined by a stellar cast, including Wrenn Schmidt (For All Mankind) as Lieutenant Marla McGivers, Sonya Cassidy (Reacher) as Dr. Rosalind Lear, with Star Trek veteran Tim Russ (Star Trek: Voyager) reprising his role as Ensign Tuvok and the legendary George Takei (Star Trek) as Captain Sulu.

Supporting voice cast includes Olli Haaskivi (Oppenheimer) as Delmonda, Maury Sterling (Homeland) as Ivan, Mercy Malick (Mr. Mayor) as Ursula, a
title: Star Trek: Khan - Official Podcast Trailer (2025) Naveen Andrews, Wrenn Schmidt

author: IGN
description:
Tune in for the Collegiate Games Challenge winners on Wednesday, August 13 at 3pm PT / 6pm ET! The national competition honors students across the US who create innovative video game projects. 

#IGN #Gaming
title: Collegiate Game Challenge 2025

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A new Helldivers 2 Xbox trailer has just dropped, and while Xbox fans are obviously very happy to finally help defend Super Earth, Halo fans are going nuts over a possible crossover tease at the end of the trailer. The short scene features a single drop pod landing in an urban setting, but with rain and a moody soundtrack not unlike some scenes from Halo 3: ODST. And with the game coming to Halo's home console, it makes sense that developer Arrowhead would celebrate by collaborating with one of Helldivers' biggest inspirations. In other news, gamescom Opening Night Live is this coming Tuesday, and host Geoff Keighley is already teasing an exclusive look at Resident Evil: Requiem. And we take a look at one of Borderlands 4's vault hunters, Rafa the exo soldier.
Presented by Borderlands 4.
title: Halo ODST Could Be Dropping Into Helldivers 2 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Winter Soldier Polarity Soldier Costume Reveal Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit free-to-play action hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players will be able to attain a look for the Winter Soldier like no other with the Polarity Soldier Costume, having equal parts positive and negative hanging in the balance. Get a look at Cloak and Dagger's new Polarity Bond Costume as well for Marvel Rivals, with both skins launching on August 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #MarvelRivals
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Winter Soldier Polarity Soldier Costume Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Release Date Trailer for Baki Hanma: Blood Arena, an upcoming 2D anime arcade fighting game developed by Purple Tree. Players will square off against opponents in intense and brutal combat against legendary fighters. Based on the hit Netflix anime, Baki Hanma: Blood Arena allows for skill-based battles to be fought strategically with an anime aesthetic. Baki Hanma: Blood Arena is launching on September 11 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Baki Hanma: Blood Arena - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Terminator Collaboration Trailer for State of Survival, a free-to-play strategy mobile game developed by FunPlus. Players can now gain access to the new Terminator 2: Judgement Day collaboration content, including new limited-time events and specific missions catered towards the Terminator fan. The Terminator Collaboration for State of Survival is available now for iOS, Android, and PC.
title: State of Survival x Terminator - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get ready to enter the Avatar State. Watch the Magic: The Gathering x Avatar: The Last Airbender trailer for the trading card game to see some of the cards as part of the upcoming collaboration. Magic: The Gathering x Avatar: The Last Airbender will be available to play early at local game stores on November 14, 2025. It will be in stores everywhere from November 21, 2025.

#IGN #MTG #ATLA
title: Magic: The Gathering x Avatar: The Last Airbender - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Experience the thrill of aerial combat like never before with Aces of Thunder, the upcoming VR flight simulation game designed with high-fidelity graphics tailored for the latest generation of VR headsets.

Aces of Thunder will be available on Steam, PlayStation VR2, and PlayStation 5 in 2025.

#ign #AcesofThunder
title: Aces of Thunder - Official Single Player Campaign Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Exclusive 'Pull Over' Clip for the original action thriller series Butterfly, distributed by Amazon Prime Video. Don't miss this intense clip that starts out as a simple traffic stop that, in turn, elevates to guns being drawn and shots being fired. Butterfly premieres on August 13 exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.

Butterfly is a character-driven spy thriller that explores complex family dynamics within the treacherous world of global espionage. It's centered on David Jung, an enigmatic, highly unpredictable former US intelligence operative living in South Korea, whose life is blown to pieces when the consequences of an impossible decision from his past come back to haunt him, and he finds himself pursued by Rebecca, a deadly, sociopathic young agent assigned to kill him, and Caddis, the sinister spy organization she works for.
 
Butterfly stars Daniel Dae Kim, Reina Hardesty, Piper Perabo, Louis Landau, and more. The series is directed by 3AD, with the executive
title: Butterfly - Exclusive 'Pull Over' Clip (2025) Daniel Dae Kim, Reina Hardesty

author: IGN
description:
The original trailer for Ridley Scott's film Alien has been recreated using footage from Noah Hawley's new show, Alien: Earth.

When a mysterious space vessel crash-lands on Earth, a young woman and a ragtag group of tactical soldiers make a fateful discovery that puts them face-to-face with the planet’s greatest threat in the sci-fi horror series “Alien: Earth.” As members of the crash recovery crew search for survivors among the wreckage, they encounter mysterious predatory life forms more terrifying than they could have ever imagined. With this new threat unlocked, the search crew must fight for survival and what they choose to do with this discovery could change planet Earth as they know it.
 
Lead by Sydney Chandler, the series showcases an expansive international cast which includes Alex Lawther, Timothy Olyphant, Essie Davis, Samuel Blenkin, Babou Ceesay, David Rysdahl, Adrian Edmondson, Adarsh Gourav, Jonathan Ajayi, Erana James, Lily Newmark, Diem Camille and Moe Bar-El.

FX’
title: Alien: Earth - Official "Homage" Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN
title: Alien: Earth's trailer vs original movie trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the combat of Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree in this latest trailer for the upcoming action game. 

Learn about the fighting styles of the Tsurugi and Kagura, and how you can use them to your advantage, along with branching paths and Graces to guide your journey. Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC on September 19, 2025.

#IGN #TowaAndTheGuardiansOfTheSacredTree #Action
title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree - Official Combat Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
From legendary director Chuck Russell (A Nightmare on Elm Street 3, The Mask), Witchboard resurrects the '80's horror classic with a chilling new vision. In present-day New Orleans, a cursed artifact unleashes a vengeful witch, drawing a young couple into a deadly spiral of possession, temptation, and occult terror.

The film stars Jamie Campbell Bower ("Stranger Things," The Twilight Saga: New Moon), Madison Iseman (Annabelle Comes Home, Jumanji franchise), Aaron Dominguez (“Only Murders In The Building”, The Inspection) and Renee Herbert & Elisha Herbert (Divinity).

The Avenue and Atlas Distribution will release Witchboard in theaters on August 15, 2025.

#IGN #Witchboard #Horror
title: Witchboard: Exclusive Clip  (2025) Directed by Chuck Russell

author: IGN
description:
Barry (voiced by Michael Cera) battles Dijon (voiced by Marion Cotillard) in this silly scene from Season 2, Episode 5 of Sausage Party: Foodtopia.

In Season Two, exiled from home, Frank, Barry, and Sammy soon find themselves in New Foodland, a shining utopia for food and humans alike. But beneath the city’s glossy fridges and cheery smiles lies a dark secret that threatens the entirety of sentient food society.
 
Returning cast members include Seth Rogen, Will Forte, Edward Norton, Michael Cera, Sam Richardson, Ruth Negga, Yassir Lester and David Krumholtz —with some tasty new additions: Academy Award-winner Marion Cotillard, Jillian Bell, Martin Starr, Melissa Villaseñor, Patti Harrison, Jay Pharoah, Miles Fisher, Haley Joel Osment and Andre Braugher.
 
Sausage Party: Foodtopia is executive produced by Ariel Shaffir and Kyle Hunter, who also serve as showrunners. Shaffir and Hunter co-wrote the 2016 animated feature film with Seth Rogen and Evan Goldberg. Rogen, Goldberg, James Wea
title: Sausage Party: Foodtopia, Season 2 - Exclusive Clip (2025) Michael Cera, Marion Cotillard

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Echoes of the End, a single-player third-person action-adventure game developed by Myrkur Games. 

Players will fight on a journey to prevent a war that comes ever closer to fruition, alongside rescuing your brother. Make use of unique magical abilities to dispatch enemies and reveal the history of Aema. Echoes of the End is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #EchoesofTheEnd  #ActionRPG
title: Echoes of the End - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Character Pass 3 Launch Trailer for One Piece Pirate Warriors 4, an anime hack-and-slash beat 'em up fighting game developed by Koei Tecmo. 

Players can now access new fighters as part of the Character Pass 3, including Eneru, King, and Z joining the fray. Take a look at the latest trailer to get a peek at the upcoming fighter coming with DLC No. 7 as part of the Character Pass 3 coming in Fall 2025 with Lucci-CP0-. Eneru, King, and Z are available now as part of the Character Pass 3 for One Piece Pirate Warriors 4 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #OnePiece #PirateWarriors
title: One Piece Pirate Warriors 4 - Official Character Pass 3 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't let those martial arts skills and huge muscles fool you--Arata's heart is as big as his biceps.

Meet Arata and learn more about the character in this Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar trailer for the upcoming farming simulation remake. Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) on August 27, 2025.

#IGN #StoryofSeasons #FarmingSim
title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar - Official Arata Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet Freya and get to know this character in this Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar trailer for the upcoming farming simulation remake. Freya has a busy job in the city during the day, but make sure to find her unwinding at the cafe in the evenings. She may find a spark with someone who's as hardworking as she is--like the new farmer in town, perhaps?

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) on August 27, 2025.

#IGN #StoryofSeasons #FarmingSim
title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar - Official Freya Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet Jules and get to know this character in this Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar trailer for the upcoming farming simulation remake. Between his teaching duties and looking out for his little brother, Jules is a busy man. But there's still room for someone special, if you get on his sweet side.

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) on August 27, 2025.

#IGN #StoryofSeasons #FarmingSim
title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar - Official Jules Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning director Christopher McQuarrie shares this never-before-seen deleted portion of the submarine sequence with Tom Cruise and explains why it didn't make it into the finished film. This is part of a larger deleted scene montage with optional commentary by McQuarrie available as bonus content for the film's digital release.

Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning is available to buy on Digital on August 19, 2025 (August 18 in Australia) and will arrive on 4K Ultra HD/Blu-ray SteelBook, 4K Ultra HD/Blu-ray, and DVD on October 14, 2025.
title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning: Exclusive Deleted Scene (2025) Christopher McQuarrie

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Xbox Launch Trailer for Viewfinder, an atmospheric perspective-based puzzle game developed by Sad Owl Studios. 

Players will make use of their instant camera to progress through abstract and serene spaces using the perspective of the images allowing for traversal in the real world. Explore vibrant locations in Viewfinder, available now for Xbox Series X|S, with the game also being available for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Viewfinder #PuzzleGames
title: Viewfinder - Official Xbox Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Learn about the Psittacosaurus, a small herbivore from the Cretaceous period, in this latest Jurassic World Evolution 3 trailer for the upcoming sim game. 

Notable for being possibly the most species-rich non-avian dinosaur genus, the Psittacosaurus is joining the roster in Jurassic World Evolution 3. Jurassic World Evolution 3 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on October 21, 2025.

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #JurassicWorld
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Psittacosaurus Dinosaur Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced, a psychological horror action-adventure game developed by Ninja Theory. 

Players will embark on a journey as Senua faces the darkness within and around her through a Viking Iceland adventure. Make use of the new additions to the game with the Enhanced Edition fitted with Performance Mode, Enhanced Photo Mode, Developer Commentary, and more. Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox PC, Xbox Cloud, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Hellblade2 #PlayStation
title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in VR? Yes, it's finally happening! Get a look at some first-person parkour/traversal gameplay in this early look at TMNT: Empire City, the upcoming co-op action-adventure starring your favorite heroes in a half-shell. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3713650/Teenage_Mutant_Ninja_Turtles_Empire_City/

#IGN #Gaming
title: TMNT: Empire City Dev Diary: Traversal/Parkour Gameplay First Look

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Hell Is Us in this new trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game. Hell is Us will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S and PC on September 4, 2025. A demo for Hell Is Us is out now on consoles and PC until August 28, 2025.

If war is the closest we get to hell on earth, it's because Earth harbours the worst of demons: humankind. In an isolated country ravaged by infighting, discover the secrets of your past and deal with the repercussions of a mysterious calamity.

#IGN #HellIsUs #ActionRPG
title: Hell is Us - Official Console and PC Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The Guild: Together, We Won't Fear Tomorrow' Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest Black Ops addition to the hit first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

Players can learn more about the efforts of The Guild, an in-universe organization tasked with heading to the front lines of global pressure points in modern society, from the threat of AI, devices listening in on ordinary citizens, facial recognition coupled with how it relates to the First Amendment, microplastics, and more. Learn more about The Guild's efforts in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7

#IGN #CallOfDuty #BlackOps
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official 'The Guild: Together, We Won't Fear Tomorrow' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Bring The Boom' Xbox Pre-Order Trailer for Helldivers 2, a third-person action co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead. 

Players on an all-new platform can join the fight for freedom, liberty, and Managed Democracy by enlisting in the Helldivers to rid the galaxy of evil to protect the way of life for Super Earth. Travel to distant locations to embark on missions, earn new weapons and Stratagems, and fight alongside other fellow Helldivers. Helldivers 2 is launching on Xbox Series X|S on August 26, with the game being open for pre-orders for Xbox Series X|S now. 

Helldivers 2 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Helldivers2 #Xbox
title: Helldivers 2 - Official 'Bring The Boom' Xbox Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Graphics Comparison Trailer for Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac, a remake of the hit classic 3D action-adventure platformer developed by Now Production Co. 

Players can get a sense for the visual upgrades given to this iteration with Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac, including new assets, improved resolution, higher frame rates, and more for the modern era of hardware.

#IGN #PacManWorld2 #Remastered
title: Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac - Official Graphics Comparison Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Phasmophobia is returning to Grafton Farmhouse! The once-simple farmhouse has become a haunting ground, filled with all new interactions, fully reworked rooms and an eerie new attic space! 

The rework of Grafton Farmhouse is available today as a free update for all Phasmophobia players! 

Phasmophobia is out now for PC (Steam), PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation VR 2 (PS VR2), and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Phasmophobia #PhasmophobiaDLC
title: Phasmophobia - Official Grafton Farmhouse Rework Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Checkout 30 minutes of gameplay, from the StarRupture Single-Player playtest.

Originally code-named Chimera, StarRupture is a sci-fi first-person co-op shooter combining base building, exploration, combat, and resource management. Set on an alien planet, the environment is torn apart by a catastrophic cycle of destruction caused by its titular star. Players can team up with up to 4 players to take on waves of hostile enemy monsters all while facing the planet’s fiery inferno or extreme cold.
title: StarRupture: Single-Player Playtest - Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Check out the Announcement Trailer for Asterfel, an upcoming dark fantasy action RPG developed by Mysteria Studio. Players will awaken on Asterfel after a shipwreck leads them to the island of greed, fractured alliances, and supernatural forces. Align with different factions for specific rewards, explore a plethora of landscapes from forgotten ruins to dense jungles, and take on enemies in search of forgotten secrets. Asterfel is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Asterfel - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong Bananza has a ton of fossils to collect in every level, and we’re mining through the world to uncover them all! In this video we’ll be going over every fossil location in the Tempest Layer. Whether you’re looking for the 10 rare fossils or the 61 common fossils, this guide will show you where to find them all so you can purchase and upgrade outfits for DK and Pauline!

What You'll Find in This Video:
Exact locations for all 10 Rare Fossils
Exact location for the Legendary Fossil
Map locations for all 72 fossils found in the Tempest Layer

For more on the individual common fossils of this layer, check out the wiki page: https://www.ign.com/wikis/donkey-kong-bananza/Tempest_Layer_Fossil_Locations

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:33 Common Fossils & All Fossil Map Locations
03:05 Rare Fossil #1
03:25 Rare Fossil #2
03:53 Rare Fossil #3
04:15 Rare Fossil #4
04:34 Rare Fossil #5
04:57 Rare Fossil #6
05:16 Rare Fossil #7
05:39 Rare Fossil #8
06:00 Rare Fossil #9
06:18 Rare Fossil #10
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - Every Tempest Layer Fossil Location | Rare and Legendary
